summary: The diff implements all three requirements comprehensively. REQ-6 (second phone number) is addressed across Contact, Footer, Hero, ServiceCard, Services, and Header components. REQ-7 (premium redesign) is addressed with animated hero taglines, feature bullet lists per service card, a new WhyChooseUs section, hover/transition animations, improved typography hierarchy, and responsive layout. REQ-8 (background images) is addressed with hero-bg and why-choose-us-bg images referenced from /assets/generated/. All acceptance criteria appear to be met.
